title: Suicide Over the Life Cycle: Risk Factors, Assessment and Treatment of Suicidal Patients. Edited by S. J. Blumenthal and D. J. Kupfer. (Pp. 799; illustrated; £55.95.) American Psychiatric Press: Washington, DC. 1990.
